SQLDataSource.Author: IFS RnD
SQLDataSource.Name: IND_SHIPMENT_MANAGEMENT_LINES_COUNT
SQLDataSource.Where: shipment_id IN(SELECT shipment_id FROM &AO.SHIPMENT WHERE shipment_category_db = 'NORMAL' AND objstate IN ('Preliminary', 'Completed') AND ('$COMPANY$' IS NULL OR (NVL(&AO.COMPANY_SITE_API.GET_COMPANY(contract), '%') LIKE '$COMPANY$')) AND ('$SITE$' IS NULL OR (NVL(contract, '%') LIKE '$SITE$')) AND ('$STATUS$' IS NULL OR (state LIKE '$STATUS$')) AND ('$RECEIVER_ID$' IS NULL OR (NVL(receiver_id, '%') LIKE '$RECEIVER_ID$')) AND ('$NEXT_STEP$' IS NULL OR (NVL(NVL(&AO.Shipment_Flow_API.Get_Next_Step(shipment_id), 'N/A'), '%') LIKE '$NEXT_STEP$')) AND ('$SHIPMENT_TYPE$' IS NULL OR (NVL(shipment_type, '%') LIKE '$SHIPMENT_TYPE$')) AND ('$FORWARDER$' IS NULL OR (NVL(forward_agent_id, 'N/A') LIKE '$FORWARDER$')) AND ('$ROUTE$' IS NULL OR (NVL(route_id, 'N/A') LIKE '$ROUTE$')) AND ('$DELIVERY_TERMS$' IS NULL OR (NVL(delivery_terms, 'N/A') LIKE '$DELIVERY_TERMS$')) AND ('$SHIP_VIA$' IS NULL OR (NVL(ship_via_code, 'N/A') LIKE '$SHIP_VIA$')) AND ('$SHIPMENT_ID$' IS NULL OR (shipment_id LIKE '$SHIPMENT_ID$')) AND ('$CONSOLIDATED_SHIPMENT_ID$' IS NULL OR (NVL(TO_CHAR(parent_consol_shipment_id), 'N/A') LIKE '$CONSOLIDATED_SHIPMENT_ID$')))
